bill.title: Relating To Income Tax.
bill.description: Adds new tax credit for teacher's expenses. Adjusts annually for tax years beginning on or after January 1, 2024, the income tax brackets, personal exemption and standard deduction amounts, dependent care credit, household renters credit, and refundable food/excise credit by a cost-of-living adjustment factor. Increases the amounts for the income tax brackets, personal exemption amount and standard deduction amounts for tax year 2023. Increases the adjusted gross income amounts for the qualification of low-income credits. Increases the amount of the credits that assist working families. Effective 6/30/3000. (HD1)

history.action: Referred to EDN, FIN, referral sheet 3
Re-referred to EDN/ECD, FIN, referral sheet 10
Bill scheduled to be heard by EDN/ECD on Tuesday, 02-14-23 2:00PM in House conference room 309 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on EDN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Woodson, Marten, Kapela, Martinez, Matayoshi, Perruso, Quinlan, Todd; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Garcia.

The committee on ECD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Holt, Lamosao, Kong, Nakamura, Quinlan; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Hussey-Burdick, Pierick.
Reported from EDN/ECD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 697) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Marten excused (1).
